decsription: In its third season, Naagin brings back its legacy of power, passion and revenge. A mythical tale of vengeance in its purest form, the wedding of an Icchadhari Naag and Naagin is marred by a group of drunken youngsters. The atrocities result in the death of the Naag. Watch how the Naagin takes it upon her to avenge the death of her partner.

MTV Roadies is back and this time it's going to be XTREME! Original Roadie - Rannvijay, Girl Boss - Neha Dhupia, seasoned judge - Nikhil Chinapa, reality show king - Prince Narula and first-time gang leader - Raftaar embark on an adventurous journey with our Roadies, where they face the ultimate test of courage. And to add to the excitement, Rannvijay dons a new role of Mahaguru this season. Does this mean he has the power to change the game? Catch all the action from MTV Roadies Xtreme right here on Voot.

Two best friends, one broken marriage, and a dangerously addictive affair! Follow the dramatic twists and turns in the lives of Mauli, her husband Kunal, and her best friend Nandini. What happens when the unhappily married Nandini realises that the mutual admiration between her and Kunal has turned into fatal attraction? Will friendship be forsaken for love? Will one woman's happiness becomes another woman's heartbreak? Find out in Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka.

Is dance your passion? Is dance your reason for living? Then join Bollywood's ultimate dancing queen, Madhuri Dixit Nene, on the hottest dance reality show this side of the planet. 3 age categories, countless dancers in each category and a shared passion for dance! Watch as Madhuri and her co-judges Tushar Kalia and Shashank Khaitan, look for the best dancers of the nation in Dance Deewane.

Aditya and Zoya are madly in love with their respective partners, until one day their worlds collide in the most shocking twist. Their spouses are found together, after losing their lives in a brutal accident! Dealing with the unbearable loss, Aditya and Zoya are hounded by many unanswered questions - why were their partners together? Were they having an affair? Were their marriages nothing but just a sham? Watch this complicated story of love and betrayal unfold now on Voot.

Do you often ask yourself if there was someone better out there? Do you feel you are 'settling' in a relationship? The Love professors Karan Kundra and Anusha Dandekar are back to clear all your doubts! But be warned, it's the toughest test of love... yet! Break-ups, heartburns, betrayals and of course a good dose of love, the third season of Love School has it ALL!

‘Real men don’t cry.’ ‘A woman’s place is at home.’ There are many such stereotypes that plague our society’s mindset at large and Roop – Mard Ka Naya Swaroop challenges these stereotypes. Shamsher Singh Baghela wants to train his son, Roop, to become an ‘asli mard.’ But what happens when he realizes that Roop who has a heart of gold, cannot bear to mistreat women? Watch this little one and his rather big journey only on Voot.

Kasam is a story of star crossed lovers Rishi and Tanu who are destined to be together since birth. Their love has stood the test of time, cheating even death. This story of reincarnation will even make non believers believe in love.

She had the perfect life, the perfect man but little did she know that she was walking into the perfect trap. What happens when the man you love turns out to be a genius manipulator? Watch how Arohi's life is twisted and turned into a nightmare that just doesn't end.

Dil Se Dil Tak is the love story of Parth and Shorvori, who decide to get married, despite stiff opposition from their families. However, destiny has other plans for them as they cross paths with Teni. Can their relationship stand the test of love and time?

Once a debauched rockstar, Ahaan has finally found his purpose in life, all thanks to Pankti. But what happens when he finds out that the love of his life has always been used by a rich man, who happens to be Ahaan's uncle? Has Ahaan's love story ended even before it began? Or will he fight for his love, Pankti?

If there is one goddess in our mythology who is feared and revered at the same time, it is Kaali. She is the ultimate destroyer. She destroys limitations so that we can create. She destroys the negative, so the positive can lead to a new beginning. Watch the magic and enigma that makes Kaali, the mother of all goddesses.

A tale of power, destruction, love and deceit, this is an epic story about the life of Princess Chandrakanta. After her family loses their kingdom to Queen Irawati, Chandrakanta grows up unaware about her heritage until Prince Veerendra enters her life and from there on begins their larger-than-life saga.

Roopa Awasthi's life revolves around two things-her forever brooding husband and her favourite weapon of choice, her belan. Until one shocking event changes everything forever! Amarnath Awasthi, who often ignored his wife, can now do nothing except follow her around. The only hitch is that she's the only one who can see him!

Ammaji is back! Living a retired life, she is now a changed person and her only aim in life is to protect her 2 granddaughters, Anushka and Jahnvi. But what happens when one wrong move by her granddaughters takes Ammaji back to where it all began - Veerpur. Watch the second part of the saga unfold.

Back with another smashing season, Entertainment Ki Raat is loaded with killer comedy, juicy gossip and candid chats with your favourite celebrity guests. So for that dose of laughter you need ever so often join Saumya Tandon, Neha Pendse, RJ Abhilash and the coolest gang of comics ever - Mubeen Saudagar, Balraj and child artist Divyansh!

Set against the backdrop of culturally rich and vibrant Punjab, Shakti-Astitva Ke Ehsaas Ki portrays the power of a family to dictate the fate of its daughters, Soumya and Surbhi. Deprived of an education, companions and toys, Soumya can't understand the indifference her father and Dadi show towards her and finds solace only in her mother's arms. Meanwhile Surbhi gets everything she wants, except for the one thing she yearns for-her mother's love. What has caused these heart-breaking rifts in this otherwise perfect family? What makes parents discriminate between their own daughters? Watch the mystery unfold.

This is a classic good-trumps-evil kind of story, told through the most lively and endearing protagonist ñ Chakor. Though born to parents who are bonded laborers in a small village, Chakor is a free-spirited little girl that social boundaries can't reign in. She has had a drama-filled childhood, having been kept 'girvi' while she was still in her mother's womb. At the age of 7, she is sent to be the bonded labourer of the rich and evil landlord, Bhaiyaji. But the bold Chakor refuses to get bogged down by fate and takes on the powerful Bhaiyaji to break free from the shackles and reach for her dreams.

Set in the midst of the medical world, Savitri Devi College and Hospital is the journey of Saachi. After clinching her dream internship, Saachi meets the two men who will turn her world upside down-the dashing Dr. Aryan, and the carefree intern Veer. Caught between a handsome surgeon and an adorable prankster, while pursuing her dream is tough. But Saachi is also guarding a secret, which if revealed, will ruin her life. What is this secret? Find out now.

From taking digs at the U.S Govt to juicy Hollywood gossips, Trevor Noah has a twisted take on all things controversial! Sit back and enjoy the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture with some serious sarcasm, only on The Daily Show.

5 years, 5 kids, 3 marriages and who knows how many drinking sessions later, the Jersey Shore family is back... and this time they are taking over Miami! Join Nicole 'Snooki', Mike 'The Situation', Jenni 'Jwoww' and all your other deeply tanned friends as they run riot on the most scandalous reality show EVER.

Fearless Arjun Vajpai has his eyes set on the third highest mountain in the world, Mount Kangchenjunga. One of the youngest Indians to scale Mount Everest, Arjun has decided to scale the mighty Kangchenjunga. As the world watches in awe, will Arjun conquer the daunting mountain and create history? Find out now on Mountain Dew and VICE present Kangchenjunga Calling, only on Voot.

Want to be a judge on a singing reality show? Here's your golden chance to choose the next Rising Star! After a super-successful first season, Rising Star is back and at the helm are the audience. With 3 amazing mentors, unbelievable talent and over 1.3 billion judges, Rising Star is the only LIVE singing reality show of the Nation. So what are you waiting for? Download the VOOT App and be a part of a revolution that will change Reality TV forever.

series_name: LinkedIn MTV Get A Job S04
decsription: We've all got our wishlist of dream companies to work in, don't we? The show that gives you the ultimate career kickstart is back with its fourth epic season! The best in the business will take on the most deserving candidates, but only after they really prove their mettle. So watch on to see some ambitious dreams turn to reality, only on LinkedIn MTV Get A Job, Season 4.

Ever been bullied on social media? Scrutinising and criticising your every move, cyber-bullies can leave you scarred for life. Hidden behind the anonymity of the Internet, the Troll Army has been getting bigger and bolder. But not anymore! MTV Troll Police is here to unmask the cowardly trolls and bring them face to face with the celebrities who they have mercilessly trolled. It's time to face the music, it's time for the deadly face-off!

Loved season 1 of the no-holds-barred chat show? BFFs With Vogue is back with more sass and sizzle than ever before! Watch Neha Dhupia play the ultimate Bollywood Insider as she hangs out with tinsel town's real-life BFFs. It's time to dish out all those well-kept secrets!

A big shout out to all the poker fans out there! Get ready for an action-packed poker championship, the Match Indian Poker League. With television's biggest stars joining in, these nail-biting poker matches will keep you on the edge of your seats. Watch as the 10 teams go all out in one of the biggest poker tournaments ever!

16 aspiring models, an impeccable fashion squad and India’s biggest runway to fame! Supermodel Lisa Haydon brings Top Model to India with edgy tasks, fierce competition and bold fashion. Are you ready for an epic fashion battle? We sure are!

The stage is set, the stars are ready and the biggest Bollywood night, 63rd Filmfare Awards 2018, is upon us! From Shah Rukh Khan's exceptional wit to Ranveer's contagious quirks, the awards night is surely an affair to remember. Get ready for the glitz, glamour and glory on Filmfare Awards 2018, streaming now on Voot.

Lucky Luke is a lonely cowboy travelling through the far-west. Accompanied by his faithful destrier Jolly Jumper and almost with each episode by Rantanplan the dog prison warder which is lost regularly in the West while wanting to follow Lucky Luke or to find its prison. He is confronted against various gangsters and shadies such as The Daltons, Billy The Kid, Jesse James or Phil Defer.

15 celebrities, 1 bigg house and 100 days of unadulterated entertainment! Ready for the first Marathi edition of Bigg Boss? From high-octane fights to uncensored drama, Voot's got everything you need for your daily Bigg Boss fix. Hosted by actor-director Mahesh Manjrekar, Bigg Boss Marathi is one show you just cannot miss.

series_name: Vh1 Inside Access with MissMalini S02
decsription: Miss Malini is back with Season 2 of Vh1 Inside Access and this time it's all about excess access! From who's dating who to what's trending on social media, #getthescoop right here! What are you waiting for? Get your Inside Access now, right here on Voot.

Box Cricket League is back, and it promises to be bigger and better than before. Watch your favourite stars Mouni Roy, Divyanka Tripathi, Rithvik Dhanjani and many more get their A game on at the cricket field. So let the glam game begin, only on Voot!

8 killer teams, 96 fierce players and one epic championship! World's first and only Mixed Martial Arts tournament, Super Fight League, is back with a bang. With uninterrupted cage-fights and uncensored action, even your favourite Bollywood celebrities aren't shying away from a full-blown clash. So don't wait up and get Vooting now!

Ever loved anyone more than yourself? Then Love On The Run is just for you! Inspired by real life stories, the one-of-its-kind show takes us through the adventurous and borderline crazy lives of couples who dared to choose love over societal pressures. And guess who will help these couples? None other than TV’s favorite lover boy - Shantanu Maheshwari.

Amongst the millions of deities worshiped in India, there is one who is most feared. One who strikes a merciless balance between good and evil and makes us realise the cycle of Karma. This is the story of the most revered planet of the zodiac and the Lord of Justice, Shani. What gives Shani his powers and makes his vengeance so potent? Find out with this mythological TV series that's sure to be an audience favourite.

Are you ready to jam with the biggest music artists of the country? Unplugged is back with a line-up that you just cannot miss! From Farhan Akhtar to Shankar Mahadevan, there's something for everyone! What are you waiting for? Time to get Unplugged now.

Bigg Boss is back and this time it's all about loving thy neighbour. Superstar Salman Khan is here with Bigg Boss 11 where it's all about clashes, comedy, controversy and of course, unadulterated drama along with high octane Voting and Elimination. It doesn't get bigger and better. Watch Bigg Boss 11 now.

Calling all Gamers! India's first multi-platform, multi-game E Sports championship is here! It's 35 days of non-stop gaming with 6 power-packed teams fighting it out for a grand prize. The games? CS:Go, Dota 2, Tekken 7, and Real Cricket '17. Ready for the ultimate gaming experience? Watch U Cypher with MTV now.

Ready to witness the ultimate fight between the rules of science and the laws of love? 10 boys, 10 girls and an Oracle who will decide whether or not a couple makes the perfect match! It's time to 'catch your match', Splitsvilla style!

India's biggest EDM festival, Vh1 Supersonic, is back and this time it promises to be Super Crazy! With a phenomenal line up of headliners like Sean Paul, Major Lazer, Alt+J, Incubus, Marshmellow and Hypnotic Brass Ensemble, and guest stars like Nucleya and Dillon Francis, this one's bound to be EPIC. Watch this space for some exclusive dope straight from the festival.

After two successful seasons of India's biggest model hunt, here comes season 3 of India's Next Top Model. Thirteen girls will battle it out to win the coveted crown. The judges for this season are, style diva Malaika Arora, fashion photographer Dabboo Ratnani and supermodel Milind Soman.

Fantastic performances, epic gags and some truly well-deserved awards! The Indian Television Academy Awards 2017 brings together your favourite TV and film stars for a star-studded celebration of the absolute best on TV. Watch now!

Get set to be 'entertained' with Entertainment ki Raat! A bevy of talented artistes like Ravi Dubey, RJ Mallishka, Raghu Ram, Aditya Narayan and many more are setting the bar high with their outstanding acts and mic drop sessions. So what are you waiting for? Tune in and add a dose of entertainment to your weekends!

A suave detective who solves twisted cases in a jiffy, Dev Burman is a man shrouded in mystery. This detective has a past that haunts him, a dead wife that some believe he himself murdered, and a romantic interest who goes from being a con artiste to a tantrik medium in a minute! Ready for the thrills and chills?

Dropout Pvt. Ltd. turns the spotlight on a bunch of under-qualified underdogs, or shall we say the square pegs who just don't fit in the round holes?! What happens when these so-called 'rejects' face the biggest real-world business challenges? Can their dreams survive the harshest reality check ever?

The nation's first and only English singing talent hunt is back with a whole new action-packed season and this time it's India who will decide the winner.  What's more? The Stage is now open to solo artists, duos and groups, which only means that the music and the madness is going to hit a note higher than ever.

What happens when a new born baby is picked by an influential god-woman as the God's chosen one? Life takes little Devanshi on a path too demanding for a child. But now, at only seven, Devanshi is about to enter the biggest battle of her young life as destiny pits her against the deceitful Mata Kusum Sundari, the same god-woman who chose her as the temple's 'blessed child'. Can she change the mindset of people whose lives have always been ruled by blind faith? Can a 7-year-old expose the manipulative and evil god-mother who has used and abused her power over innocent devotees?

Getting married once? Perfect life. Getting married twice, that too with two different girls, that too on the same day? Baap re baap! Watch Bakool and his masaledar marital life turn upside down when he accidentally gets married to Sheena and Jigna. How will he manage two wives without going absolutely crazy? We suggest you sit tight with your family and watch Bakool's hilarious misadventures!

The story revolves around two sisters, Simar and Roli, who get married to the sons of the Bharadwaj family. The young bahus are the ideal daughters-in-law, and will fight villians and demons alike to protect their familyís pride & honor. Full of the several supernatural twists and a whole lot of family drama, 'Sasural Simar Ka' is a must watch!

This season of Khatron Ke Khiladi is loaded with thrills, chills and a whole lot of excitement! Rohit Shetty is back, all set to transform the gorgeous terrain of Spain into a battleground for a power-packed set of Khiladis. So are you ready to root for your favourites as they feel the 'pain in Spain'?

Ek Shringaar Swabhimaan celebrates the courage and pride of a small-town single mother, Sharda, and the values and strengths with which she empowers her young daughters, Meghna and Naina. As different as chalk and cheese, the fiercely independent girls have only one thing in common, their undying devotion towards their mother. Facing several hardships in an orthodox society, Sharda has provided the best upbringing and education to her girls. But what happens when it's time to find matches for her highly educated daughters? A single twist of fate will change everything forever!

The bright and beautiful Thapki is pretty much perfect... except for one minor flaw - she stammers. But that doesn't hold her back. All she needs is an encouraging pat on the back,a 'thapki', which soon becomes her name. Over the course of the show, Thapki falls in love with Dhruv, but is duped into getting married to his brother, Bihaan. In spite of this cruel twist of fate, Thapki doesn't let her spirit fade and does all she can to be the ideal bahu. What does destiny hold for this charming girl with an unbeatable spirit?

HDFC Life YoungStars2 is a unique digital talent hunt for tiny tots with tremendous talent! Mentored by experts, 16 little singers, dancers, actors and musicians will partake in an epic competition. Who makes the cut and whose talent shines the brightest? Watch to find out.

Gaano Ka Rafu Center is back with it's second season and it's going to be double the fun! Watch your quirky host Sahil Khattar in his NO NO Money Singh avatar as he dissects popular songs. And if that's not all, he also has celebrities for company who jump into this laugh riot. Watch it, only on Voot.

The most anticipated event of the year is back as 30 gorgeous ladies compete for the most prestigious crown in the country. Join in as superstars Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt and Karan Johar celebrate beauty like never before.

If there's one award night all of tinsel town looks forward to it's the Golden Petal Awards! Join TV's biggest celebrities as they come together to celebrate the fantastic year gone by. The red carpet has been rolled out, are you ready for a night of fashion, fun and all things fabulous?

Golden Petal Awards is an award function to honour personalities for their incomparable contribution to the channel. Television personalities will be honoured under popular categories in the award function along with the most entertaining performances by your favourite TV stars!

All you Akshay Kumar fans better get ready because the trailer of Toilet - Ek Prem Katha is finally here. And if this first look is anything to go by, this one's already a blockbuster! So what are you waiting for? Catch the trailer now on Voot.

A new talent show that has no votes and no judges. It's time for the game changer to take over! On India Banega Manch, the street is the artist's stage and all they have to do is win the crowd. Every performer has a stipulated time limit to attract as many viewers possible. So are you ready to pick your favourites?

Voot brings to you snippets of the most-awaited movie of the year, Rangoon. Directed by Vishal Bharadwaj with a stellar star cast of Kangana Ranaut, Saif Ali Khan and Shahid Kapoor. Watch this space for all the action.

The biggest reality show is back with its 10th epic season. Superstar Salman Khan returns to hold court over the Bigg Boss house, which this time will be inhabited by a mix of celebrities and non-celebrities. The result? Clashes, comedy, controversy and of course, unadulterated drama. Like Salman says 'Celebrities kamar lo kas, Public bhi hai in Season Dus'

After a bone-chilling first season, the legacy of Naagin continues with Shivanya's daughter, Shivangi. While Shivanya tries hard to keep her daughter away from her real identity, it will not be long before destiny catches up with Shivangi. In a strange twist of fate, Shivangi falls in love with Rocky, who is the adopted son of Shivanya's arch nemesis Yamini. Can Shivangi come into her own as an 'icchadhari' naagin and protect the Naagmani? Or will the evil forces win this time?

Naagin, the saga of love and revenge, has had the audience hooked since its launch. The series revolves around the life of an 'ichchadhari' naagin, Shivanya, who will go to any extent to avenge the death of her parents. In a bid to get closer to the murderers, Shivanya marries Ritik, who falls hopelessly in love with her. The sometimes warm, sometimes vicious, Naagin is now torn between her thirst for revenge and her growing attraction towards Ritik.

The show gives an inside access to the biggest celebrities, their coolest hangouts and the hottest trends in Bollywood, fashion and lifestyle! Hosted by Miss Malini, the celebrity-based show also gives you a glimpse of India's thriving music and Pop Culture scene. What's more? From raiding a celebrity closet to playing 'Never Have I Ever' with them, the fun doesn't stop at Inside Access With Miss Malini!

Rising Star is a singing reality show where you can play an active part in making your favourite contestant the next big star. With live viewer engagement, best talent and the biggest musical mentors, Rising Star promises to be a show like nothing you've seen before.

Ready or not here comes the deadliest season of MTV Roadies! The battleground is ready, the daggers are drawn and the gang leaders are on a hunt for their warriors. Join Rannvijay Singha, Nikhil Chinapa, Neha Dhupia, Prince Narula and Harbhajan Singh as they put together the ultimate gangs for the battle of the century. Watch MTV Roadies Rising anytime on Voot.

Welcome to SPACE Academy, where the students are blue blooded, the cars are swanky and the lifestyle nothing short of opulent. A coming of age tale splashed with a liberal dose of fantasy, romance and adventure where Manik and Nandiniís sizzling romance rules the roost.

Meet Fab 5, the best musical group from the coolest college around, S.P.A.C.E! Join them as they go on a ride of their lives, while Manan aka Manik and Nandini discover what true love really feels like.

Watch the biggest trendsetters of the nation as they talk style, fashion and everything in between! From Akshay Kumar's favourite shopping destination to Sonakshi Sinha's fashion no-nos, Fawad Khan's take on Bollywood fashion and Malaika Arora's style secrets; we've got it all! Ready for a seductive concoction of class, panache, and trend setting choices?

It's time to catch up with your favourite Bollywood celebrities in a show that's all about friends, fun and fashion! The biggest superstars are dropping their 'forever perfect' masks and who better to spill the beans than their BFFs! On the agenda? Everything under the sun, from movies to fashion to personal style mantras! Watch your favourite stars with their favourite people now.

Remember that thrill you felt the first time you saw someone across a room, or across a smartphone screen, as you lay lonely in a strange city? Or maybe the first time you got a sudden stroke of luck leading to a fleeting moment of passion with someone way out of your league, a fantasy suddenly in your reach, maybe even a secret affair. These are the seldom spoken stories of ordinary young women and men having an extraordinary experience and in the process discovering or changing something about them.

Tum karo toh stud, woh kare toh sl*t?! It's about time that women feel free about their sexuality because an orgasm knows no gender. Big F is back with its second season with bolder sexual fantasies and irresistible desires featuring the women of today! And did we mention Randeep Hooda is the anchor of the show?! Reason enough to watch it, we say.

From Chemistry to Biology, everything is taught in school but what about the most essential subject - Love? Ever wondered how easy it would be if someone taught you the do's and don'ts of a relationship. Don't worry, we have the solution! For all such couples who are confused, on the verge of breaking up, or are in a complicated relationship - the love professors, Karan Kundra and Anusha Dandekar, are here for a quick fix. So what are you waiting for? Take out your notebooks and head back to the Love School!

Sizzling hot Karishma Tanna and her dapper partner Upen Patel take charge of real life couples in this unique Reality Series analyzing their rocky relationship and coaching them on the Doís and Doníts of making it work. On display is how they move through the tricky maze of relationships, and how they deal with expectations and heartbreaks.

Lovely ladies out to win the coveted annual beauty pageant in India! Get up, close and personal with beauties from around the country; taste the glitz and glamour of tinsel town and see lives being transformed. Live the experience called Miss India.

It's that time of the year when the biggest stars of Bollywood descend for the most magnificent awards night, the Sansui Colors Stardust Awards. This year's awards raise a toast to extraordinary talent, impeccable vision and scintillating performances, making it an unmissable event!

Indian television's biggest stars descend for the most entertaining spectacle of 2016, The Indian Television Academy Awards. Honouring the best talent and a gala show of stunning performances along with a bevy of television stars like Mouni Roy, Ssharad Malhotra, Karanvir Bohra in attendance. This awards night promises to be an affair to remember!

This blockbuster celebrity talk show is hosted by Kapil Sharma, where the biggest Bollywood stars 'walk in', while Kapilís entire family & neighbors ëbarge iní. Known for their iconic characters ñ Gutthi, Palak, Bua and Dadi, this outrageous family has always enthralled and entertained the audiences.

Presenting Comedy Nights Bachao Taaza, your favourite comedy show revamped with an extra dose of fun. This season, the Bachao Brigade of Krushna, Sudesh and Bharti are teaming up with a whole new bunch of roasters, including Mona Singh, Ssharad Malhotra, Sumeet Vyas, Amruta Khanvilkar, Balraj Syal, Aditi Bhatia, Nia Sharma and Manan Desai. So, all you celebrity guests, take cover because these roasters are coming to get you.

The nation's most-loved celebrity dance reality show is back with a bang! Watch your favourite celebrities go up against each other, as they set the dance floor on fire week after week. Adding her own brand of sizzle and sass to this season is the gorgeous Jacqueline Fernandes who will join Karan Johar and Ganesh Hegde on the judging panel. So are you ready for some dance, masti, magic and masala?

After 5 spectacular seasons, MTV Unplugged returns with an artist lineup that will totally blow your mind. From musical greats like A R Rahman to Hip Hop icons such as Badshah and Bollywood music royalty Shreya Ghoshal, Amit Trivedi

Indiaís first ever classic ëCandid Cameraí prank show which has acquired cult status and can be watched over and over for its humour, suspense and intrigue value. Cyrus Broacha and his team mastermind wicked gags which corner celebrities and commoners alikeÖall for a good laugh!

Post the astounding success of Comedy Nights With Kapil, comes the hilarious Comedy Nights Live. Hosted by Krushna and Bharti, with Mika Singh being the new Sidhu Paa Ji, this laugh riot has the audiences in splits. Every week, new celebrities hop aboard the bandwagon to promote upcoming movies and interact with the insanely talented comic artists.

Bigg Boss Season 4 brings together a compelling pick of fourteen celebrities locked up at a house in Lonavla. The fourteen week entertainment packed journey witnesses a pinch of glitz, glamour, wit and drama. Get a glimpse into the unscripted life of your favourite celebrity.

Fourteen hand-picked contestants followed by few more entrants are chosen to live in a one house for 98 days, under the supervision of 55 cameras, which is under the supervision of the great voice of Bigg Boss.

A number of celebrity contestants live in a house, isolated from the outside world. Each week, the housemates nominate their peers upon the instructions of the Big Boss. Urvashi Dholakia wins the title for Season 6.

A number of celebrity contestants live in a house, isolated from the outside world. Each week, the housemates nominate their peers upon the instructions of the Big Boss. Gauhar Khan wins the title for Season 7.

Season after season, a bunch of celebrities with varying personalities and flaring tempers, survive 100 days in the Bigg Boss House. In season 8 of this mega popular show, the house resembled the interiors of an aircraft, with Salman Khan piloting the housemates through a series of entertaining challenges. Loaded with a whole lot of dramatic fights, tough tasks and sizzling link-ups, this one is a must watch.

Rann VJ Run is a adventurous show featuring Rannvijay, who carries out thrilling adventures in different parts of the world to discover his inner self. He steps out of his comfort zone to perform extreme sports, parties hard and explores new places.

The hottest host on Indian television, the juiciest controversies, the most talked about link-ups- all this and more on the biggest reality show ever, Bigg Boss. With housemates Prince Narula, Mandana Karimi, Rishabh Sinha and Rochelle Rao being the audience favorites, 'Bigg Boss: Double Trouble', was packed with enough drama to last an eternity.

MTV Splitsvilla is a dating reality show which brings together boys and girls, who then try to find the perfect partner by completing various tasks. The Splitsvillans are eliminated, until it comes down to a boy and a girl who are declared winners. The winners of season one, which is hosted in Goa, are Vishal and Shraddha.

MTV Splitsvilla 2 returns with the second season, featuring boys and girls who compete against each other to gain points and find a perfect partner. The Splitsvillans are eliminated, until a boy and girl are declared the winners. The winners of season two, which is hosted in Goa, are Siddharth Bhardwaj and Sakshi Pradhan.

The MTV Splitsvilla 3 went international and was shot in the exotic Pattaya. The format of Splitsvilla changes in this season, where the king and the queen are voted and challanged every week. Parag Chadha and Riya Bamniyal are the winners of the third season.

MTV Splitsvilla 4 continues to select the best boys and girls into doing tasks that bring out their strengths and weaknesses. Season four has 4 boys and 13 girls, with the girls being divided into 4 groups called Qabilahs, led by the 4 boys. This season is shot in Dubai. Dushyant Yadav and Priya Shinde are the winners.

MTV Splitsvilla 5 starts with 9 boys and 9 girls. It is set in the picturesque Jim Corbett National Park, Uttarakhand. Hosted by Nikhil Chinapa, the fifth season sees Akansha Popli and Paras Chhabra as the winners. They are crowned with the title, Splitsvilla 5 - Love Gone Wild.

This season was premiered on May 25 and was hosted by Sherlyn Chopra and Nikhil Chinappa. It is tagged as Hot as Hell. There are 9 males and 9 females in Splitsvilla 6. This season also had a review show for each episode titled 'Sexy Sana' hosted by Sana Saeed.

MTV Splitsvilla 7 is hosted by Bollywood actress, Sunny Leone, and Nikhil Chinapa. The show starts with 7 boys and 20 girls, out of whom 2 are kings and 2 queens. Set in Samode Palace, Jaipur, it was one of the most popular seasons. Mayank Gandhi and Scarlett Rose are the winners.

This season of the show has 14 girls and 16 boys, 8 of whom are celebrities. Like all other seasons of Splitsvilla, there is a lot of fight, jealousy, hatred, friendship, and backstabbing, as contestants try to stay in the competition and find love. This season also has wicked, ruthless, revengeful and angry King and Queen.

Sunny Leone and her co-host Rannvijay Singh are back with the hottest reality show in town. This time, the show is based on the theme 'Where Women Rule', and it gives more power to the female contestants than their male counterparts. Fifteen boys, or warriors, will be competing to woo female contestants who are the princesses on the show. In the end, one boy and one girl will be crowned winners.

MTV Roadies is a reality show for the youth dealing in adventure, drama and travel. The Roadies have to survive on a fixed budget given to them as they travel to complete the tasks. The show was designed by Raghu Ram and Rajiv Laxman.

MTV Roadies 2 sends the contestants to unknown destinations to accomplish tasks that will determine their chances of continuing to be a part of the show. This season takes the Roadies on a journey from Kolkata to Wagah border in Amritsar.
MTV Roadies 3 has participants take part in tasks to accumulate money in their Roadies account. They are put through gruelling tasks in some of India's toughest terrains.

MTV Hero Honda Roadies 4 featured 13 contestants who took the road on their Hero Honda Karizma bikes to go to various locations to complete the tasks. The season introduced Gulshan Grover, who made the game even tougher for the Roadies.

In MTV Roadies 5, the tasks are divided into 'Money Tasks' and 'Immunity Tasks'. 'Money Tasks' allow the Roadies to add cash to their account, while the 'Immunty Tasks' offers immunity against vote out. Ashutosh Kaushik is the winner of MTV Roadies 5.

MTV Roadies Hell Down Under, the sixth season of MTV Roadies introduces Raghu Ram's twin brother, Rajiv Laxman in the show. This season featured the maximum number of contestants. Nauman Sait emerges as the winner.

In MTV Hero Honda Roadies 7, the participants ride with Rannvijay to be chosen as Roadies. The Roadies ride Hero Honda bikes to complete tasks which test their physical and mental abilities. The show is shot extensively across India, Kenya, and Egypt. Anwar Syed emerged as the winner.

The eighth season, MTV Roadies - Shortcut to Hell, is called so because the second half of the season, shot in Sao Paola, Brazil, was very tough. This season had 6 female and 7 male contestants. This season of MTV Roadies sees the second female winner, Aanchal Khurana from Delhi.

MTV Roadies 9: Everthing or Nothing had the Roadies travelling to the USA for the very first time. The season commences with 13 contestants, who participate in 'Money Tasks', 'Immunity Tasks', and 'Advantage Tasks'.

The tenth season, MTV Roadies X: Battle for Glory, changes the format of the show with this season. Contestants are now divided in two groups: Rannvijay with his team of participants from the auditions and Raghu with his team of ex-Roadies.

As the tag line suggests, the eleventh season of Roadies had 15 contestants riding across the country, fighting it out in the toughest terrains. The contestants traveled from Jodhpur to Mehsana in Gujarat to perform tasks that test their physical and mental caliber. Pune boy Nikhil Sachdeva claimed the title of a roadie, winning a cash price of 3 lakhs which is the lowest to be ever handed out to a winner across seasons.

The biggest stars of the Kannada film industry are coming together for the ultra-glamorous Colors Cinema Gourava. With the most charming hosts, Srujan Lokesh and Akul Balaji, this epic night is loaded with a whole lot of high-voltage performances by your favourite stars. Watch the gala awards night right here on Voot.

Superstar Kiccha Sudeep is back with Season 5 of Bigg Boss but with a incredible twist. For the first time, Bigg Boss Kannada house opens its gates for the common man! Brace yourself for some high-voltage drama, shocking controversies, mushy romances and a constant tug of war between the celebrities and the non-celebrities.

The Nation's longest running sketch comedy show 'Majaa Talkies' is back with its second edition, and it's going to be double the fun! Get ready to witness the popular host Srujan Lokesh and his family in an all new avatar and a brand new house. That's not all! Catch up with your favourite celebrities as they waltz into this mad house, making this show a must watch.

Your favourite Bigg Boss 5 winner Chandan Shetty is heralding in the biggest musical night of the year. Hosted by Kavya Shastry and Vinayak Joshi, it's an evening loaded with entertainment. With the likes of stand-up comic Kirik Keerthi and rapper ALL OK putting on some stellar performances, Haavali is one event you don't want to miss!

18 teacher-student duos battle it out every week to achieve the ultimate glory - become the first Master Dancer. Hosted by Mr Popular Akul Balaji, the dance reality show will witness little wonders matching steps with their dance gurus. In the judges' chair are Bigg Boss Kannada winner Chandan Shetty, renowned Bharatanatyam dancer Mayuri Upadhya and the gorgeous actress Sruthi Hariharan. Are you ready for the ultimate dance battle?

Superstar Puneeth Rajkumar presents a unique game show that brings together two families. The family that can connect and communicate better, takes home a grand prize. So join the fun as Puneeth takes you on this incredible new journey.

The dashing Raman wants to see his step-sister Anvitha happily married to the love of her life, Aditya. But Aditya wants to first find the right match for his own sister, Aradhana. Hoping to ensure Anvithaís happiness, Raman goes out of his way and finds Aradhana a groom. But little does anyone know that Sitara Devi is about to play a viscous game that will change their lives forever. Will destiny bring Aradhana and Raman closer to save their siblingsí marriage? Watch the drama unfold.

What happens when a marriage is over, even before it has begun? In 'Agnisakshi', Sannidhi gets married to Siddharth, believing that beyond their 'saat pheras', lies paradise. But her dreams are shattered when she realizes that her husband is in love with another woman, and wants a divorce immediately after the ceremonies are over. How does Sannidhi deal with this disastrous twist of fate? Will Siddharth ever see the beauty in the simple Sannidhi?

Amongst the millions of deities worshiped in India, there is one who is most feared. One who strikes a merciless balance between good and evil and makes us realise the cycle of Karma. This is the story of the most revered planet of the zodiac and the Lord of Justice, Shani. What gives Shani his powers and makes his vengeance so potent? Find out with this mythological TV series that's sure to be an audience favourite.

Get ready to tickle your funny bones as our talented comics compete to win the grand trophy. 6 comprising of 4 comics showcase their impeccable sense of humour and we bet you just can't keep a straight face.

Celebrate the grand festival of Ugadi with Niranjan Deshpande and Niveditha Gowda in Colorful Ugadi 2018. Watch all the much-loved Colors Kannada celebrities perform to your favourite numbers, play fun games and so much more. Join them in the spirit of Ugadi now!

'Majaa Talkies', a comedy series hosted by the very popular Srujan Lokesh, where he invites celebrities from all walks of life for a fun-filled chat. While the stars come to promote their upcoming films, the show also has a satirical take on the contemporary issues of our daily life.

The story revolves around a female protagonist, who like most women, believes in love and destiny. But what happens when the very man you love, makes you question your faith in love and destiny? A drama packed series, which is relatable to every woman who watches it, 'Soubhagyavathi', is a show you must check out.

This is a comic serial portraying the story of a scientist, Tommy. He creates a humanoid, and introduces it to his family. The Robot tries to imitate human emotions and solves various problems in a funny way, making it an entirely different type of comedy series to watch.

This heart-warming drama series tells us the story of the innocent and adorable Mani, whose simple world is tossed upside down when her doting mother dies of cancer. But before dying, her mother has written a letter to Mani's father, who is married to another woman, and asked him to take care of Mani/Kinnari. The story depicts Mani's/Kinnari's struggles as she learns to live without her mother.

Promising to break all the gender stereotypes, Dikri Vahalno Dariyo follows the life of the young and ambitious Kinjal Bhatt. Her only goal? Turning her father's small tea stall into a big cafe. But the journey to the finish line is far from easy. Will Kinjal triumph over the many hurdles that stand between her and her dream? Find out now.

Anchored by popular actor, Sohan Master, Daily Bonus is based on three core needs of human nature - necessity, comfort, and luxury. The host travels to different cities and interacts with families. They are then made to compete against each other in different rounds to win a bounty.

The twelfth season of the popular adventure reality show MTV Roadies packs a stronger punch than the previous editions. This season, extensively shot in both India and Nepal, had all the quintessential ingredients of an entertaining reality show. From excruciating tasks to unabashed scheming and plotting, Roadies Season 12 had the audience glued to their TV sets.

Roadies is a reality show that showcases the drive, ambitions and aspirations of India's youth. This journey is not just about being on the road but about finding oneself along the way as contestants battle it out for the top spot.

This season of the immensely popular, celebrity-packed reality show is set in Argentina. The 'Fearless Fourteen' of season 7 include Mukti Mohan, Jay Bhanushali, Mahhi Vij, Sidharth Shukla, Tanishaa, Sana Saeed and others, with Vivian Dsena coming in as the wild card entry. Hosted by the young and whacky Arjun Kapoor, the show has a great mix of high impact stunts and seemingly impossible challenges that push the Khiladis to the very limit of their physical and mental endurance.

'Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi ñ Darr Ka Blockbuster Returns' is the sixth edition of the action and adventure packed reality show based on the hit American series 'Fear Factor'. Hosted by the stunt and action specialist, Rohit Shetty, this season had the contestants face their biggest fears and rise to the insane challenges laid out for them. The fearless pack included Sagarika Ghatge, Nandish Sandhu, Rashmi Desai, Meiyang Chang and Aashish Chowdhary.

'Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi ñ Darr Ka Blockbuster' is the fifth season of the action and adventure packed reality show based on the hit American 'Fear Factor'. Set in South Africa, this season's motley crew included Gauahar Khan, Rochelle Rao, Mugdha Godse, Gurmeet Chowdhary, and Rajneesh Duggal amongst others. Hosted by the ace action-man himself, Rohit Shetty, this season is loaded with chills, thrills, danger and glamour.

Set against the coastal splendour of Cape Town, the 'Torchaar' season of Khatron Ke Khiladi sets the screen ablaze with everyone's favourite Khiladi, Akshay Kumar. He leads a pack of daredevils who pull out all stops to prove their mettle and triumph.
'Fear Factor, Khatron Ke Khiladi' Season 03 is hosted by Priyanka Chopra. She leads the participants to Brazil, where they perform dangerous stunts. Shabbir Ahluwalia wins the title.

In 'Fear Factor, Khatron Ke Khiladi Season 2', watch the contestants perform incredible, adventurous, and gritty stunts. The show hosted by Akshay Kumar was shot in South Africa and also shows the local vista.

This historical drama, based on life of King Ashoka Maurya, continues to hold its place in the viewersí list of favorites. The period drama charts the journey of a young Ashoka as he fights for his rightful place in the empire of Magadh and then follows his rise to the throne. As he fights all odds, we see Ashoka coming of age and battle destiny in an attempt to make Chanakya's dream for a united India, come true.

The story revolves around a girl who is a part of the film industry, but has no particular ambition and simply lives a mechanical life. Her destiny takes a drastic turn when she meets the famous actor, R.K. and eventually ends up marrying him and becoming an actress of his stature.

'Meri Aashiqui Tum Se Hi' is a modern day romantic saga that follows the lives of best friends-turned-lovers, Ishaani and Ranveer. Like every rose has its thorns, this heart-warming lovestory has its own heart-wrenching twists of fate. Will Ishveer's love triumph over the manipulative scheming of those who can't bear to see this couple together?

The series revolves around the lives of Zain and Aliya, two lovers whose families are sworn enemies. What happens when the past of your family members haunts your future with your loved one? Can real love triumph over family rivalry?

Code Red is a show based on real life crimes, hosted by Sakshi Tanwar. The series has dramatic recreations of hair-raising, real incidents from across the nation. A special takeaway is where the host motivates the viewers to raise their voices against crime and criminals.

The original clutter breaker of Indian TV, Balika Vadhu, leads the pack when it comes to socially relevant shows. The journey of the show began with a focus on child marriages and over time, has progressed to woman empowerment. Destiny now seems to hold a terrible twist for the show's protagonist, Anandi, as her own daughter may face a similar fate- A Child Marriage.

'Swaragini' is a story about Swara and Ragini, who belong to warring families, but later realise that they are in fact half-sisters. Out of sheer hatred, Ragini manipulates Swara's love interest, Lakshaya into marriage, while Swara ends up getting married to Lakshya's brother, Sanskar. Once he learns the truth, Sanskar swears to reunite Swara with Lakshya, but in turn falls in love with her. Will Swara choose her lover over her husband, or will the sanctity of holy matrimony triumph?

'Naa Aana Is Des Laado' is a social drama that raises its voice against the oppression of women in the Indian hinterlands. The story revolves around Veerpur's powerful matriarch, Ammaji, who believes and propagates the absolute suppression of women. But challenging Ammaji's rigid and archaic beliefs, are her own grand-daughters, Dia and Jhanvi. What ensues is a battle between two opposing ideologies, a war between regressive traditions and progressive values, that has the audience glued.

Uttaran is a story of two friends hailing from drastically different backgrounds. Tapasya is the spoilt daughter of a wealthy man, while Ichcha, her best friend is the maid's daughter. While society cannot separate the two, love, does just that. Veer, whose marriage proposal was initially rejected by Tapasya, falls in love Ichcha, and that is something Tapasya just can't bear. The series takes an interesting turn when a spiteful Tapasya marries Veer and the once best friends are locked in a love triangle, with the helpless Veer stuck in the middle. The show spanning thousands of episodes, eventually goes on to follow the lives of their children.

Set in the traditional city of Benaras, the social drama 'Ishq Ka Rang Safed', is a tale of impossible love. What happens when the son of a staunch religious guru falls hopelessly in love with a widow? Dhani, a young widow abides by the archaic customs that force widows to lead a colorless life, while Viplav is strongly against this orthodox ideology. Swathed in white, and devout to her cause, Dhani maybe a conformist to tradition, but is not weak minded, because try hard as he might, Viplav is unable to sway Dhani his way.

This brand new social drama revolves around the life and love of Aradhya, whose mother and grand-mother have been devdasis, but Aradhya herself has been leading a relatively modern life. She falls in love with Aryan, who is not only her college mate, but also hails from the same village, Krishnavati. The young and full of love couple realize that their lovestory is going to be fraught with challenges, when they find out that their families have been locked into a 20 year fued. Aradhya, determined to find out the reasons behind the fued, also begins to seek the truth about who her father really is. But her whole world comes crashing down when she realizes that she is expected to carry the Krishndasi tradition ahead.

The super hit show focuses on Parvati, an orphaned village girl whose life changes completely when she meets Major Rudra Pratap. What follows is an unexpected and sensual love story, as they battle against the patriarchal rules of the Thakurs and escape from outlaws.

The show is centered around the desertion of brides by NRI grooms that is prevalent in various regions of Punjab. Gurbani is the story of young and spirited girl from Punjab with dreams in her eyes of an NRI wedding and a happy life thereafter.

KawachÖKaali Shaktiyon Se is a story of love, passion and obsession that breaks the barriers between the living world and the afterlife. Unable to let go of her lover, Rajbir, Manjulika returns from the dead to haunt him and his wife, Paridhi. Delving deep into supernatural elements like black magic, possession and exorcism, this eerie drama series showcases the epic battle between good and evil.

Depicting the life of Lord Krishna, from the birth of the 'Makhan Chor' to him becoming the Prince of Mathura and Dwarka, this mythological drama also focusses the deep friendship Krishna shared with Sudama and his divine bond with Radha.

'Phulwa' is a dramatic series that revolves around little 'Phulwa', an innocent village girl, who is as sweet and harmless as her name implies. But as fate would have it, Phulwa is destined to become a strong and fearless bandit, who will go to any lengths to avenge the deaths of her loved ones. What causes this shocking transformation? How many loved ones does Phulwa have to lose before life starts being fair to her? Watch now to find out.

Parichay nayee zindagi kay sapno ka is a story of a dejected lawyer, Kunal Chopra, who after facing several failures in his career, has almost given up on life. With his professional career in tatters, Kunal's middle-class family can barely make ends meet. But things start to look up after fate plays a gamble and gets Kunal and Siddhi married. Will Siddhi's love give meaning to Kunal's life? Will love help Kunal make his professional dream, a reality?

Mahavir Hanuman gives you a glimpse into the life of Lord Hanuman, the deity who represents physical strength and devotion. From Hanuman's birth to meeting Ram for the first time and later serving him, this show traces all aspects of the life of Sankat Mochan.

Hailing from a small town in Kanpur, Narayan Shastri's four daughters - Alka, Anushka, Devyani and Peeya, are in for a culture shock as they relocate to Delhi. While coping with their personal struggles, the four sisters learn to live in a big city and yet manage to retain the essence of their small town lives.

Shaitaan is a show that delves into the minds of the worst criminals society has ever seen. The show will recreate the gruesome crimes in an attempt to decode what goes on in the minds of criminals when they commit shocking acts of violence and crime.

Megha is a young widow with two children. The story is about her fight for justice for her tainted husband, with support from Mohan, who eventually falls in love with her. Will she succeed in her fight and marry Mohan is unraveled as we go along.

The love story of Megha and Mohan continues but under much changed circumstances. 12 years after we last saw them, their children Aditya, Navika and Rimjhim are now key players. Vasu a lookalike of Mohan and local goon impacts their lives.

Jai Kishan wants to stay with his family, but his situation forces him to leave his home and go to the US. The show is about how he tries to convince his family to accept Bhoomi, a girl bred in US, as their daughter-in-law.

The Vaishnav family is ready to face new challenges after a year has passed. Kishan and Dhara have to deal with Deepika and Ketki's attempts to ruin the family's happiness. Will they manage to keep things together?

Chhota bachcha jaan ke inko...don't underestimate! Chhote Miyan Dhaakad is ready to take over your world and we guarantee that this bachcha party is a laugh riot. Join Neha Dhupia and Sohail Khan as they look for the most entertaining kids from across the country. As the season progresses, the comedians get funnier and the gags get crazier until finally one chhota packet bada dhamaka emerges the winner of the season!

After moving to Mumbai, Param desperately needs a roof over his head, especially when his best friend, Rahul, also gets kicked out of his rented apartment. The duo learns of a house up for rent, but the landlady? got a simple condition - her tenants must be married! With no option left, Param and Rahul spin a web of lies and pose as husband and wife. What follows is a hilarious roller coaster ride, packed with friendship, love and absolute chaos, as we enter the world of Mrs. Pammi Pyarelal.

This historic drama narrates the centuries-old legend of the fierce warrior king, Shivaji. From his days as a much-loved prince to his transformation into one of history's most revered warriors, the series follows his glorious rise to being the founder of the Maratha Empire, 'Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj'.

You may have seen a tailor working his magic on a piece of cloth, but have you seen a tailor who works on songs? Presenting apka favourite local tailor Salim Suimia who likes to dissect Hindi songs, only to rafu them with a whole new meaning.

The show revolves around three young women, a TV producer Isha, a tabloid journalist Gia and a DJ, Revati who plan to hit it big in a metropolitan city like Mumbai and analyse aspects of their relationships, careers and aspirations.

Fannah is the story of an unconventional love quest as Vivaan, the only Vampire left in town, searches for love, mortality and so much more. Through all things supernatural and eerie will Vivaan succeed?

A team of medical students start their new life with enthusiasm and joy but destiny sets a supernatural adventure before them. Unaware of the dark and mystical world, the students set out to unravel the mystery.

MTV Webbed brings to the fore a world of deceptive appearances, deceit and lies, which often manages to trap the young generation and turn them into victims. A drama series that depicts real-life incidents of cyber abuse and crime committed through the virtual medium, this is a must watch for the millennial generation.

Faceless predators on the Internet pose a great risk to unsuspecting users. Webbed, in its second season, showcases such scary and compelling stories of people who have become victims of Internet fraud and heinous crimes.

Warrior High is a prestigious high school in Dehradun. The show follows the lives of young boys and girls as go through the trials of heartbreak and compete against each other to rise up the social ladder.

Zam, Ajax, Sahana and Venky are four friends who like most other 20 some-things are caught up in the rigmarole of work and living in the big city. They catch up every Saturday Night to discuss love, sex, bosses, politics, cricket and so much more.

Every week 'Comedy Nights Bachao' brings together celebrity guests, who literally become the butt of all jokes. Despite the show's roast-like format, everyone from Ranbir Kapoor to SRK, Salman Khan to Deepika Padukone, have been on the show. The memorable 'burns' are delivered by teams of comic crusaders - Krushna, Sudesh & Adaa Khan, Bharti, Karan Wahi & Pritam Singh, Anita Hassnandani & Mubeen, Shruti Seth & Shakeel Siddiqui, Pooja Bose & Naseem Vicky.

Glitz, glamour and glory were in abundance at the Golden Petal Awards 2013 with the biggest television superstars in attendance! The awards night rolled out the red carpet for the hottest divas and the biggest hunks of the television industry. What are you waiting for? Watch Golden Petal Awards 2013 now!

Biggest television superstars descend for the most awaited awards night of the year, the Golden Petal Awards 2012. With the hottest stars, awesome performances and best talent, this awards night sure is an affair to remember!

The Golden Petal Awards are held to celebrate the work of the various actors appearing in Colors TV serials. Awards are declared in various categories and the night is marked by plenty of spectacular performances.

The biggest celebrities from across the world, three causes and one mission - Global Citizen Festival is coming to India for the first time. A social action platform for a generation that wants to solve the world's biggest challenges, this event is a social revolution. Leading the change movement are Coldplay, Amitabh Bachchan, Aamir Khan, Sachin Tendulkar and scores of Indian and international stars. Join the revolution and celebration to make a difference.

Baba Ki Chowki is a fun and wacky chat show where the biggest stars of B-town get candid with our very own in-house Sanju Baba, otherwise known as Dr. Sanket Bhosale. Whether or not you're a fan of Bollywood, this is one show you do not want to miss!

Four fearless and fabulous rockstars. Ten awe-inspiring stories. One epic road trip. Join Shalmali, Jasmine, Anusha and Akasa as they rev up for a musical adventure like never before. Watch the Angels of Rock inspire and get inspired by women from all across the nation, and join them as they salute womanhood through their amazing original compositions.

One of India's most loved music shows, MTV unplugged, showcases several artists across the globe. The show features musicians performing unplugged versions of their electric repertoire. Watch the likes of Rabbi Shergill, Mohit Chauhan, Indian Ocean and Rekha Bhardwaj enthrall the audience with their music.

The season 2 of Unplugged opens with a bang with musical maestro AR Rahman's performance. The show also featured much-loved singers like Sunidhi Chauhan, Lucky Ali and Ayushmann Khurrana. So, what are you waiting for? Get your music fix, right here with MTV Unplugged Season 2.
MTV Unplugged is back with a brand new line up of artists from the film industry. From Arijit's soulful music to Sonu Nigam's musical brilliance, Unplugged season 3 is nothing short of epic.
This is a series showcasing popular music artists performing songs that were officially released by them earlier. It also gives artists a podium to showcase their acoustic instrument skills.
This is a series showcasing popular music artists performing songs that were officially released by them earlier. It also gives artists a podium to showcase their acoustic instrument skills.

The second edition of the blockbuster show returns with an impressive ensemble of indie and mainstream artists including Ehsaan-Loy, Amit Trivedi and Shantanu Moitra. Tune in to catch the best of music with an all new season of Coke Studio.

A musical extravaganza that strikes the right notes on every count ñ the best musicians, the most experimental composers and the absolute best vocal talent from India. All these elements combine to create a musical extravaganza of genres ñ from Carnatic, Indian folk and Hindustani to contemporary, hip hop, rock and pop music, and a lot more.

This show is an epic platform where a wide variety of performers from different musical traditions come together & fuse their talents to create new music. Old numbers recreated and fresh compositions make up the scintillating live performances.

In an exciting journey across the nation, the show follows music director Sneha Khanwalkar as she visits ten urban communities to record new and sometimes bizarre sounds. She then uses these to make melodies, one for every place she visits.

The journey from sound to song begins again with the trio of Sneha Khanwalkar, Karsh Kale and Nucleya. This year is more fascinating with new ideas, themes and places to explore and different people who inspire them to reach their musical destination.

An unique platform for amateur musicians to collaborate with stalwarts; such as Kailasa, Shankar, Ehsaan, Loy, Talvin Singh. This is a musical journey to learn, enhance and create new sounds of music that is both collaborative and fresh.

Catch the behind the scenes making of the most popular music videos of the industry along with undisclosed fact files of new-beat musicians. MTV's Spoken Word is your one stop shop for underground music.
Tune in to the nation's first ever show about India's independent and international music scene. The show features talented artists, gig reviews, explosive interviews and amazing performances!

Manish Paul and Kapil Sharma keep the spirits high and bring to you the 6th season of Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa. Judging this spectacular celebration of dance once again are Madhuri Dixit, Remo D'souza and Karan Johar. Watch out for a keenly contested dance off between your favourite celebrities.

12 super celebrities team up with their choreographer partners and dance like there's no tomorrow! The much loved Indian version of the international shows, 'Strictly Come Dancing' and 'Dancing With The Stars', Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa pushes the envelop with choreographers outdoing each other, and their respective celebrity partners matching their incredible moves. As Season 7 progresses, judges Madhuri Dixit, Karan Johar and Remo D'Souza, raise their expectations.... and the dancing duos more than oblige!

12 super celebrities team up with their choreographer partners and dance like there's no tomorrow! The much loved Indian version of the international shows, 'Strictly Come Dancing' and 'Dancing With The Stars', Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa pushes the envelop with choreographers outdoing each other, and their respective celebrity partners matching their incredible moves. Season 8 witnesses dancing superstar, Shahid Kapoor's, first stint as a reality show judge. While Shahid and Karan Johar became the 'Swag Gurus', the gorgeous Lauren Gottlieb and Ganesh Hedge were the 'Dance Gurus' who kept a close eye on the technical perfection of the contestants. Mid-way through the series, the ever so hot Malaika Arora Khan took Karan's place on the judging panel.

Hosted by duo Manish Paul and Cyrus Sahukar and judged by celebrities, Malaika Arora Khan, Karan Johar and Kirron Kher, the 4th season of India's Got Talent showcases great dancing, Sufi music, daredevil acts and much more. Who will win the cash prize?

The Indian version of the famous 'Got Talent' series, has been making a splash ever since the first season hit the airways. This is where incredibly talented people from all over the nation take the stage and do their best to impress the tough-to-please judges, Kirron Kher, Mallaika Arora Khan and Karan Johar.

The Indian version of the famous 'Got Talent' series, has been making a splash ever since the first season hit the airways. This is where incredibly talented people from all over the nation take the stage and do their best to impress the tough-to-please judges, Kirron Kher, Malaika Arora Khan and Karan Johar. Hosted by Bharti Singh, Nakuul Mehta and Siddharth Shukla, Season 6 has raised the bar of entertainment.

An explosion of talent and showmanship from every corner of our vibrant land, make their presence felt on the stage. Super talented people battle it out in one more stunning season of India's Got Talent.

Hosted by Sonali Bendre, 'Mission Sapne' features the biggest celebrities leveraging their popularity to fullfill the impossible dreams of a common man. This unique format has celebrities take on a common man's job for a day, and deal with his daily struggles. The money earned by the star, multiplied a hundred times, is then given to the aam admi in question.
