Ragini is a simple girl who has unusual dreams about snake attacks. In one of her dreams, she sees Bharana and decides to marry him. While she ends up marrying Bharana, she is shocked to see her husband transform into a snake.

Anuraaga is a musical drama revolving around the love triangle of Abhishek, a small town singer and Pallavi and Anjali, who come from an affluent family. Abhishek is a small town singer who wants to make it big in the industry, while the girls belong to a family which owns a music production company. As the story unfolds, Abhishek not only faces the challenges of the glamour industry but also struggles to bring Pallavi and Anjali's estranged family together.

Bangari is the story of a 5-year-old girl whose world is her Father, Rajeev, and his grandparents. She is the apple of her father's eye and his unconditional love makes up for her mother's absence. But as she grows up, she is curious to know more about her mother. She keeps asking questions about her mother to her father. Finally, her father shows her a photograph and tells her that the woman in the photograph is her mother.

Welcome to a reality show which is truly about the survival of the fittest! In this show, girls compete against each other to prove their mettle. The girls face-off in tasks set up in the nation's most difficult landscapes. Their journey begins at a seashore, moves into a jungle, then over to some forts and finally ends in a desert! This action reality show is hosted by Rehman Hassan.

Girija Kalyana is an epic period drama, which has been shot and executed on a grander scale than anything seen before on Kannada television. This story is about Girija who is a gift from the gods to a childless couple, Rudramma and Devaiah. Girija is an ardent Shiva devotee who wants to destroy the evil King Amaradeva's kingdom. While King Amaradeva is against Shiva worship, his own son Rajavardhana is great Shiva devotee. His son is the only one in the empire to defy Amaradeva's ban against Shiva worship. The romantic story of Girija and Rajavardhana's marriage is steeped in divinity and fight against evil forces.

Mangaluru Hudgi Hubli Hudga is the story of modern day lovers, but with a funny twist! This intense love story is set against the backdrop of native identities clashing against each other. What happens when two families, one from Mangaluru and the other from Hubli, are forced to share the same house? While love starts to blossom between Aniruddha and Amulya, the animosity between their families only grows with each passing day.

Love the classic family drama? Kunku Tikali Ani Tattoo has it all, but with a twist! Vibhatai Kulkarni believes the happiness of her home, her husband and her children is the primary responsibility of a woman. But her traditional home is about to get shaken up by the outspoken Rama Prabhudesai. Watch what happens when a young basketball player, who doesn't even believe in the concept of marriage, becomes a part of the Kulkarni clan.

Colors Marathi is back with its 5th edition of Mirchi Music Awards! The who's who of the Marathi music industry gather under one roof to honour talent and excellence along with some sensational performances by Ankita Lokhande, Hariharan, Vaibhav Tatwawaadi and a special dedication to late Sridevi. Hosted by popular actors Sumeet Raghavan and Amey Wagh, this evening promises to be a laugh riot.

It's time to celebrate the magic of Marathi cinema with the Marathi Filmfare Awards 2017. Watch out for splendid performances by some of the most popular talent in the Marathi Industry along with the biggest names from Bollywood. So watch Deepika Padukone, Madhuri Dixit - Nene, Nana Patekar and Jackie Shroff match steps with Avadhoot Gupte, Sonalee Kulkarni, Pooja Sawant and many more!

Radha and Prem always believed that they're too different to be together. But, as they say, opposites attract! Despite all the differences between them, destiny keeps bringing Radha and Prem together. Will this attraction converge into a love story? Watch Radha Prem Rangi Rangli, now on Voot.

What is your definition of love and companionship? Is your husband your best-friend, confidante and rock of support? What if your husband gets an opportunity of a lifetime to fulfill your small yet unique desires? Navra Asava Tar Asa, hosted by Harshada Khanwilkar, is one-of-its-kind show that gives a golden chance to all husbands to make their wives proud! Watch this innovative show only on Voot.

There are singing shows and then there is Sur Nava Dhyas Nava! A reality show hosted by Tejashree Pradhan, this one pits champions against champions and has the biggest names of the Marathi music industry on the judging panel - Mahesh Kale, Avadhoot Gupte and Shalmali Kholgade. So make sure you don't miss out on this musical journey!

Assa Saasar Surekh Bai is a romantic series that proves that an extraordinary love story can blossom in the most ordinary places. Through Jui and Yash, the audience lives a love story so beautiful, that even a non-believer will acknowledge the power of love. Against all odds this young couple manages to create and nurture their own precious little world, where love, is all one ever needs.

The Ghadge household is all set to welcome their beautiful daughter-in-law, Amruta. But what happens when Amruta's modern ideologies clash with those of Mai Ghadge, the traditional matriarch of the family? Can Amruta win over Mai and still live her life on her terms? Watch Ghadge & Suun now.

Your favourite celebs, skits and special dedications are all coming together in a heady comedy cocktail. Tumchyasathi Kay Pan promises to be all this and more! Join the fun ride as host Sandeep Pathak brings to you an unique comedy show.

This is the story of Nirmala who has been in love with Sarjerao since her childhood. What happens when she realises that Sarjerao, who is all set to marry a foreigner, never loved her in return? A devastated Nirmala dies of heartbreak. But true love knows no boundaries, not even that of life and death! Thirsting for vengeance, Nirmala returns to torment Sarjerao's love interest, Jenny. Will Nirmala's unrequited love destroy Jenny and Sarjerao's world? Watch the series to find out.

It's time to celebrate Valentine's Day, but with a super-glamorous twist! Watch as all your favourite Marathi stars come together and raise a toast to love. Who do you think will be the cutest couple on the stage tonight?

One of the most prestigious award functions of the year, the Maharashtra State Awards 2017 is an evening the entire Marathi film industry looks forward to. Watch as the your favourite Marathi superstars get felicitated by the State Government for their extraordinary talent. So get ready to root for your favourites now.
A young Anandi is mistaken for a Goddess in a small village. This story unravels the struggles of a child who is trapped in a world of superstition and blind faith. Watch her journey on Voot.
Sanskruti Kala Darpan Awards 2017 promises to be a night of glamour and glitz as the film, television and theatre fraternity get felicitated. Don't forget to catch your favourite stars only on VOOT!

If the new GST bill is giving you sleepless nights, we sure have a cure for you! Comedychi GST Express is here with no judges, no scores, no tension and only tax-free laughter. So hop aboard the hilarious Gayab Sagla Tension Express now.

It's time to celebrate the magic of Marathi cinema with the Marathi Filmfare Awards 2016. Which film bags the most awards and who walks off with all the accolades? Find out along with Bollywood superstars like Alia Bhatt, Anil Kapoor and Sushant Singh Rajput.

2MAD is a dance reality show which showcases talent from across Maharashtra! Back with its second amazing season, the show is a must watch for all dance lovers. This season starts off with 20 dancers, clubbed into 10 pairs, who will fight to get closer to the winning title. Who will win the second season of 2MAD? Watch now to find out.

The annual Ganpati festival brings together communities and is a melting pot of camaraderie and cheer. But this year, it's even more special. Sayali Pathak is on the lookout for the biggest entertainer at all the Ganpati mandals in Mumbai. So join the fun at Ganpati Bappa Morya 2017.

Get ready for a culinary experience like never before as celebrity host Prashant Damle brings the most audacious dishes ever made. From revamping classic recipes to a fusion of different cuisines, nothing is off the chef's table. With a pinch of fun and a dash of entertainment, this cookery show is sure to leave you wanting for more.

This comedy extravaganza has host Bharat Jadhav interviewing the biggest celebrities of the Marathi entertainment industry. While Bharat earnestly tries his best to get the celebrities chatting, his crazy family members interrupt the interview with the funniest antics. With hilarious gags and games, this one is a must watch.

It is the story of a 20-year-old girl Saraswati. She fulfils the duties of a daughter, a sister, a friend, a wife, and a leader with aplomb. She is the strength of her family. She is determined to overcome every hurdle to fulfil her promises.

'Mejwani Paripoorna Kitchen' is a much loved cookery show that inspires the audience to make seemingly complicated delicacies, as well as dishes from international cuisines. The host meets home chefs from amongst the audience, and they share important tips and tricks to make mouth-watering preparations. What makes this show supremely popular, is that the recipes are simple and can be whipped together with ingredients easily available in an Indian kitchen.

Tu Maza Sangaati allows the audience a glimpse into the personal life of the much-revered Saint Tukaram. The series follows the married life of this spiritual poet and his second wife, Avali. The show depicts their relationship beautifully, while also tracing his journey to sainthood.

This special series was originally created for the promotion of the movie 'Classmates'. In each episode the host explores a different college, along with one of the actors from the film, and his or her friends. As the gang re-visits their old college, they relive the fun times together.

Vaidehee and Sameer are deeply in love with each other and are all set to get married. However, their relationship takes a shocking turn when they meet Priyamvada, whose fiance Ranvijay is a complete look-alike of Sameer. Priyamvada requests Sameer to help her find Ranvijay. Will Vaidehee and Sameer's life change completely because of this unknown truth? Watch this gripping tale of love, sacrifice, betrayal, justice and suspense.

The story revolves around Pallavi and her family, who decide to fulfill a promise to visit a place of pilgrimage if her father's health improves. Pallavi works hard to become a collector, and her determination brings joy to her family.

Darshan, gives its viewers an insight into various temples and their spiritual values. The host meets different people who share their spiritual lessons and talk about the miracles they have experienced in their lives.
The show portrays the transition of Vinayak to Ganesha. It focuses more on the mother-son relationship between Ganesha and Parvati.

This series explores the complexity of the relationship between the rich and the poor. It is a story of jealousy and revenge. The story revolves around a poor and fatherless girl who always receives cast-offs from a rich girl.
The show is based on a simple college-going, studious girl, Shubhra. She falls in love with a sensible, mature, and understanding older Math professor, Rajsekhar, who is a professor in her college.

In '1760 Sasubai', the bitter-sweet relationship between a mother-in-law and daughter-in-law creates a riot of laughter. While the daughter-in-law is the boss at the police station, the tables turn at home where Sasubai has the last word.

An adaptation of Vijay Tendulkar's famous play 'Kamala', this social drama tells the tale of a journalist who purchases a woman from the rural flesh trade, and goes on to expose the nexus of the police and the politicians. Based on a true incident the show has a number of twists and turns.

'Zhunj Marathmoli' is an action and adventure packed reality show, anchored by Shreyas Talpade. Through the course of the series, the celebrity contestants travel to 12 different cities across Maharashtra and participate in challenging tasks that put to test courage, willpower, and determination.

This is a comedy show where several comedians compete against each other in two teams, Susat and Bungat. Both the teams send a pair of comedians to deliver funny skits to get the best scores from the judges.
Dholkichya Taalavar is a dance reality show, where challengers will contend to win the title of the best 'Lavani Samragyi'.
Dholkichya Taalavar is a dance reality show, where challengers will contend to win the title of the best 'Lavani Samragyi'.
Dholkichya Taalavar is a dance reality show, where challengers will contend to win the title of the best 'Lavani Samragyi'.

The only dance show that caters to Lavani dance along with other dance forms such as Western, Indian, Bollywood and lots more! The competition is held between 12 female dancers with 1 elimination based on the judges marks as per performance every week.

Om and Arpita make a special deal before tying the knot. Arpitaís only expectation is that Om should never ask her to quit her job. Omís only expectation? Arpita should ensure his joint family stays intact. Can Arpita prove that the woman of today can pursue her professional passion while also handling the household?

The host Priyanka Barve welcomes the audience on her spiritual tour in Kolhapur. She shares the history of Kolhapur with the audience. She also gets a few devotees to share their experiences with the audience.

Aamchya Gharaat Sunbai Jorat is a game show in which the daughters-in-law of the two participating families compete in regards to the kind of bonding they have. The show has fun-filled activities and is hosted by the famous actor, director and singer, Prasad Oak.

Gaurav Maharashtracha is a musical treat to all the connoisseurs of music. The show, hosted by Mrunmaye Deshpande, featuring famous music composer, Dr Salil Kulkarni, and Aarti Angtilkar as the judges, is a search for a genuine singer of Maharashtra.

Delving deep into the famous Pandharpur Ashadhi Ekadashi Wari, Palkhi offers its viewers a glimpse into the Bhakti Yatra that lakhs of devotees have been embarking upon for over 700 years. Popular singer Kartiki Gaikwad hosts the show and travels in the Wari, adding her musical touch to the pilgrimage along with Charudas Aaphale's Kirtan.

This historical drama series salutes the undying spirit of the iconic heroes of Maharashtra, who have put in their lives and souls into safeguarding its culturally rich lineage. This biopic shares the journeys of historic icons such as Sant Dnyaneshwar, Mahatma Phule and Ahilyabai Holkar who have contributed to the growth, success and cultural development of Maharashtra.

This is the story of two families, the Deshmukhs and the Somans who are bound by business, friendship and trust. While Deshmukh's only son Siddharth and Soman's daughters, Radha and Noopur, have grown up together, spoilt brat Siddharth has always found the sensible Radha very boring. But what happens when destiny brings Radha and Siddharth together as prospective bride and groom? Do opposites really attract? How does this love-hate relationship change the dynamics between the two families?

Comedy Chi Bullet Train is a rip-roaring comedy showcase hosted by Tejaswini Pandit and judged by Makarand Anaspure and Renuka Shahane. This is a battleground where two teams of celebrity comics fight it out in a war of wit.

12 talented little girls, 3 awesome judges and a Lavani competition like never before - Dholkichya Taalavar is getting bigger and better with each passing season. This time, little wonders are about to fight it out on the dance floor with our favourite celebrity judges, Jitendra Joshi, Phulwa Khamkar and Shakutai, mentoring them! What are you waiting for? Time for some dance, dhamaal and action with Dholkichya Taalavar Season 05.

Year after year, the MATA Sanman Awards have celebrated the best in the field of entertainment. This much-awaited awards night has all your favourite film and TV artists winning the prestigious trophies and delivering unforgettable performances. Who will be the winners of 2017? Watch to find out.

If you love traditional music and mehfils, this one's for you! Shaheeri Baana is an evening dedicated to the biggest and most celebrated Shaheers of Maharashtra, dating right back to the time of Shivaji Maharaj. So sit back and watch as the biggest artists of the Marathi music industry bring those forgotten Shaheeri songs back to life.

Celebrating 15 years of his successful journey in the music industry, Avadhoot Gupte brings a 3-hour long musical treat to all his fans. Get ready to lose yourself as the Marathi Rockstar belts out some of his most melodious numbers, making this musical extravaganza a must-watch.

Harbhanga Police Station is in for an overhaul when young and fierce Senior Inspector Jayati Bagh takes over from the older and lazier Police Constable Satyapriya Singho. But the real shocker is when Satyapriya's son falls in love with his mother's boss Jayati and wants to bring her home as his bride! Can mother-in-law Satyapriya keep daughter-in-law Jayati under her control inside the house when she actually reports to Jayati at work? Watch their rib-tickling escapades full of fights, fury and non-stop fun on Satyameva Jayati.

Bored of the regular celebrity chat shows? It's Aschorjo Packet to the rescue! Our first Bengali Voot Exclusive will surprise you with a fresh look at your favourite celebrities who get candid and crazy like never before. Not just that, here's another secret - who is our quirky, hilarious host?! Watch now to find out.

If there is one goddess in our mythology who is feared and revered at the same time, it is Kaali. She is the ultimate destroyer. She destroys limitations so that we can create. She destroys the negative, so the positive can lead to a new beginning. Watch the magic and enigma that makes Kaali, the mother of all goddesses.

Get set for Jio Filmfare Awards East 2018! Some of the biggest names in the Bengali industry such as Rituparna Sengupta, Koel Mallick, Kaushik Ganguly and Subashree Ganguly gather under one roof to honour talent from Bengali cinema. Hosted by Parambrata Chatterjee and Abir Chatterjee, the awards ceremony promises to be an unforgettable night! Watch it now on Voot.

Set in the era of British rule, Pratham Pratishruti is the journey of Satyabati, a strong-willed, liberal and educated woman who isn't afraid to fight societal norms to provide the best for her daughter. A victim of child marriage, Satyabati vows to ensure that history doesn't repeat with her daughter. Join Satyabati's journey of empowerment as she takes on every challenge to fight for her daughter's rights.

A tale of power, destruction, love and deceit, this is an epic story about the life of Princess Chandrakanta. After her family loses their kingdom to Queen Irawati, Chandrakanta grows up unaware about her heritage until Prince Veerendra enters her life and from there on begins their larger-than-life saga.

Manasa is the snake Goddess whose legends emphasize her erratic temper and despondency, deep-rooted by her father Lord Shiva's rejection, her husband's indifference, and her stepmother's hatred. Follow the melancholic saga of the lonely Goddess who perpetually falls victim to male chauvinistic behavior prevalent among Gods. Fighting her own, can Manasa win her right to be worshipped as a Goddess?

Shubhojit Mukherjee will do anything to see his step-sister, Antara, happy. Antara is madly in love with Abir, but Abir will only marry Antra after his own sister, Drishti, is settled. For the sake of Antara's happiness, Shubho arranges a match for Drishti, but what happens when Drishti's groom goes missing on the wedding day? Shubho takes another radical decision, one that will change Drishti and his own life forever.

This is the story of little Titli, who was pawned off as a slave to the rich and controlling Thakur family. Coming from utter poverty, the only thing Titli takes with her is Resham Jhanpi, a silk pouch gifted by her late grandfather who believed it would one day change her life for the better. But will Titli face anything but torture at the hands of the Thakurs? Watch to find out.

Known also as Gauranga, Gaura or Nimai, Sree Chaitanya is believed to be an avatar of Lord Krishna. This mythological show, Mahaprabhu Sree Chaitanya, takes us on a journey that traces back to Sree Chaitanya's naughty childhood and then follows his path of spiritual awakening and his timeless teachings.

Giving the classic battle between good and evil a fantasy twist, Roopkatha is the story of the Princess of Rupnagar, Bhumi. Having grown up in the jungle instead of her own palace, Bhumi's sole aim is to reclaim the throne from evil queen Mohini. Can Bhumi, who believes in the power of positivity and goodness, defeat the queen of darkness? Will she be able to avenge the brutal murder of her own parents at the hands of Mohini? Watch to find out.

This is the story of Jhumur, the daughter of a widowed maid servant, whose world changes when she finds herself living in the house of the man responsible for her father's death. Wrecked with guilt, Apratim and Debi Sanyal, the master and mistress of the house, accept Jhumur as their own daughter and give her all the luxuries imaginable. But can their real daughter Nayanika accept Jhumur as an equal? Can she get over the jealousy she burns with, or will she always see Jhumur as nothing but the 'servant's daughter'?

This is the tale of Lata and Kajal, whose fates are tied together by strongly-guarded family secrets. Why is Lata's Nani so staunchly against her neighbours, Shobha and Shobha's daughter, Manjari? Will Lata ever know what happened to her own mother who she lost so early? Will Kajal ever find out that the father she so often asks Manjari about is in fact Lata's father, Keshab?

This is the heart-warming story of a daughter born to a courtesan in Benaras, who fights with every breath to gain the acceptance of her father. Set in a musical world that echoes with thumris, khayals and tappas, this is one drama series that will touch your soul.
Long drives, some great conversations and impromptu karaoke... watch your favourite celebs do all this and a lot more along with RJ Somak in the new talk show Golmaal Express!
Heinous crimes, helpless victims, gripping investigation and crackdowns! Re-creating real-life crimes against women, Hushiar Bangla aims at making its audience aware and alert. You have been warned!

Amongst the millions of deities worshiped in India, there is one who is most feared. One who strikes a merciless balance between good and evil and makes us realise the cycle of Karma. This is the story of the most revered planet of the zodiac and the Lord of Justice, Shani. What gives Shani his powers and makes his vengeance so potent? Find out with this mythological TV series that's sure to be an audience favourite.

'Naagin (Bengali)', the saga of love and revenge, has had the audience hooked since its launch. The series revolves around the life of a 'ichchadhari' naagin, Shivanya, who will go to any extent to avenge the death of her parents. In a bid to get closer to the murderers, Shivanya marries Ritik, who falls hopelessly in love with her. The sometimes warm, sometimes vicious, Naagin is now torn between her thirst for revenge and her growing attraction towards Ritik.

After a bone chilling first season, the legacy of Naagin continues with Shivanya's daughter, Shivangi. While Shivanya tries hard to keep her daughter away from her real identity, it will not be long before destiny catches up with Shivangi. In a strange twist of fate, Shivangi falls in love with Rocky, who is the adopted son of Shivanya's arch nemesis Yamini. The evil icchadhari naagin Sesha also returns as Ruchika. Can Shivangi come into her own as an icchadhari naagin and protect the Naagmani? Or will the evil forces win this time?

Glamour, glitterati and glory were in abundance at the Filmfare Awards East 2017. The most awaited awards night of the year rolled out the red carpet for the biggest Bengali stars, witnessed the most electrifying performances and rewarded the best talent! What are you waiting for? Watch Filmfare Awards East 2017 to find out who takes the black lady home.

If you like comedy shows, then trust us you're going to love Chakachak Comedy Chak! Join Rudy and Kancha on their notorious adventures across town and catch up with Rudranil, who every weekend interviews a different celebrity and gets them to spill all their glamorous secrets. Worth a special mention? Kancha's Chandni Chok News and the weekly Talentino Awards that celebrate the strangest talent you've ever seen.

Depicting the life of Lord Krishna, from the birth of the 'Makhan Chor' to him becoming the Prince of Mathura and Dwarka, this mythological drama also focusses the deep friendship Krishna shared with Sudama and his divine bond with Radha.

Bindass Dance Season 2 is back! Watch the extraordinary display of talent by young kids aged between 4 and 12. Bindass Dance has handpicked 25 contestants from Bengal, who will get an opportunity to showcase their passion and talent before a panel of celebrated judges.

The much loved mythological series, 'Sadhak Bamakhyapa', follows the life of the 18th century spiritual leader and the most devout worshipper of Goddess Tara. The devotional drama revolves around this unconventional saint's fight against the staunch, orthodox temple practices, and tells stories of how he used the super powers bestowed upon him by the Goddess, for the betterment of his people.

Byomkesh is a crime drama series based on the life of the young and sharp private detective, Byomkesh Bakshi. Along with his trusted friend Ajit, Byomkesh solves several spine-chilling crime cases. Byomkeshís uncanny ability to analyze crime scenes, and logically thread together every case, makes this show a thrilling experience!

Babli, a headstrong and independent girl, lives life on her own terms. Her father, Rajpal Dutta, wants her to marry a boy of his choice, whom she rejects. She, in turn falls for a talented young footballer, Utsab. Her father, who incidentally owns a football team himself, lets Babli marry the love of her life. But in a horrible twist of fate, Babli realizes that Utsab has something else on his mind? Will Babli's love remain unrequited? Will Utsab ever be able to choose love over football?

Rabi Thakurer Galpo is a compilation of classic short stories from the Noble Laureate, Rabindranath Tagore. The show, directed by Sudeshna Roy and Abhijit Guha, takes the audience into a beautiful world built by Tagore's ageless stories, unforgettable characters and flawless story-telling.

'Srimati Champion', is a game show especially for women and hosted by Ananya Chatterjee. This show gives an exciting opportunity to the housewives of Bengal to have some fun and earn awesome goodies. The game show has 3 segments - the first tests the speed of the participants, the second, tests the focus, while the third tests the accuracy in completion of the task.

'Bhule Jeo Na Please', revolves around the lives of Nidhi and Rony, who meet each other on their journey to Kolkata. While Nidhi falls for the flamboyant Rony instantly, her feelings are shattered when she finds out that Rony, is instead attracted to her friend, Ishita. Who amongst the three will be left heart-broken?

'Aponjon', follows the lives of Antara and Siuli, whose fates get entwined forever, when they get switched at birth. A convict as an act of retribution, switches his own daughter with the daughter of the advocate who has him convicted wrongly. The story then moves 18 years ahead in time, when the truth comes to light. The shocked and helpless advocate now brings his daughter by birth Siuli, to live with his family, which includes the biological daughter of the convict, Antara, who the advocate has raised lovingly as his own. As fate would have it, both girls fall in love with the same man, Sam, and as expected things get all the more complicated.

Meera, the young protagonist, gets married to an Army Officer, but soon gets widowed. Healing takes time and moving on is difficult, but eventually Meera meets an ex-Army Officer named Subhankar, whose relationship with his wife is in tatters. Subhankar's son however grows an emotional bond with Meera, while Meeraís daughter Mishti becomes emotionally dependent on Subhankar. Will the desires and wishes of the two children bring Meera and Subhankar together?
The mega hit 'Maa Durga', is a mythological series on Goddess Durga and the legends associated with her. Every episodes tells a different tale that glorifies the powers of Maa Durga.

Bindass Dance is a talent show for children below 16 years of age. The reality show encourages the little ones to showcase their dancing prowess and put their best foot forward. The young contestants are ready to set the stage ablaze with their dance moves, making this show a must watch!

In this social drama centered on child marriage, an 8-year old Gouri, is married to Biswanath, who is just 13. While the young bride learns to follow the customs of her new home under the orthodox iron hand of Katyani, she soon wins her in-laws over. As Gouri and Biswanath grow up together, a strong bond forms between the two. Over the course of the series, Gouri also develops a strong sense of self, and is soon unafraid to raise her voice against anything that's even remotely unfair.

This is an exciting reality game show and as the name suggests, it features enthusiastic mommies and their lively kids. The show has the competing mother-kid duos go through several rounds of challenging games, until a winning team reigns supreme over the rest.
Prathama is a lifestyle show for women of all ages. The immensely popular series features everything from make-up and grooming tips, to great house-keeping techniques and stress-free cooking.

'Shonge Srijit' is a talk show hosted by National award winning Filmmaker, Srijit Mukherjee. He invites celebrities, he invites popular faces from the Bengali Cinema and talks about their personal lives. The set of the show resembles Srijit's home.
Abbulish is an action-packed, high energy game show format, where week after week various celebrities come and play exciting games to win big prizes.

This story is about Sohag and Deepto, who share a love-hate relationship and in a twist of fate, end up marrying each other. Will Sohag be able to break through the barriers of right and wrong to make a place in Deepto's heart? Will love ever bloom between them? Or will it be lost in the deep void of their differences?

Great Music Gurukul is a talent hunt, with renowned singers Hariharan, Kavita Krishnamurthy, Javed Ali and Jeet Ganguly acting as mentors to 24 gifted contestants. The fabulous four hone the talent of the singers, handpicked from across the nation, of which only the 10 best artists will proceed to the next level of the singing face off.

Lilaboti, a devotee of Maa Manasha, transforms into a snake every full moon night. Her father, a devotee of Lord Shiva throws her out of the kingdom when he comes to know this truth. Lahama fixes Lilaís marriage with Ishan, the king of that kingdom. However, on the day of their marriage, Ishan appears with his wife Ganga, a Shiva devotee. The battle lines have been drawn between the innocent Ganga and the magical Lila. Who will win this conflict between the devotee of Shiva and Manasha?

Bigg Boss Bangla is the Bengali version of the super hit reality show, Bigg Boss. Jeet will be the host, and the viewers can be sure of more conflicts and crackling entertainment in another fresh season.

This is the story of Sapla, a poor village girl and the rich, modern Polok, whose family decides to get her married to Bedh, a well-settled entrepreneur. But wishing to pursue her modeling dream, Polok runs away. In a shocking turn of events, Sapla becomes Bedh's bride, but is unfortunately shunned away by everyone. Will Sapla win over her in-laws and her husband? Or will Polok return to claim her rightful place?
Anu meets Rockstar Raj who gets allured by her melodious voice and decides to launch her as a promising new talent in the industry. Will the magic of music bind these two souls together?

Taranath Tantrik is the story of a man who practices Tantrism to fight evil powers. The story tracks the journey of how Taranath becomes a tantrik, stops practicing the ancient tradition and then takes it up again to save his family and mankind from evil powers.

The drama series revolves around the lives of two budding singers - Saheb, a village boy and Shoi, an orphan raised by a music baron, Janardan Ray. While initially Saheb and Shoi start off on the wrong foot, their love for music brings them closer. Things take a turn for the worse, when Janardhan Ray gets to know about their budding love and orders Saheb's music teacher to ask him to quit singing as a gurudakshina. What will Saheb's decision be? Will Saheb and Shoi's love survive this test?

A heart-warming story of Mungli, who breaks free from the shackles of slavery and begins her new journey in the big city. Will she be able to adjust to the fast life and different norms of an urban metropolis?

Rudrani, raised in a small village by a commoner, has no idea that she is infact a princess and belongs to a royal family. Her father, King Shobur, was a victim of a devious conspiracy. As she has inherited exceptional powers from her parents, she is on a quest to avenge her parents betrayal and reclaim what is rightfully hers.

Gaaner Gnuto is a musical game show involving 4 contestants, 4 rounds of wacky challenges and a whole lot of fun! Can the contestants concentrate on singing amidst a bunch of unexpected hurdles? Watch now to find out.

You may have watched serials where poor girls fall in love with rich spoilt brats. But what happens when the two meet and fall in love at a juvenile correction facility? Jannat has taken the blame for a murder to save her sister and Udaan has accidentally killed someone while defending a girl. Can the two overcome the traumas they have faced when they leave the facility? After getting married, can they bridge the religious barriers between their families?

'Rannaghare Rockstar' is a fun and unique game show that revolves solely around food. From being blindfolded and guessing a food product by the sound and smell of it to cooking up a storm in record time, this one is a delight for all foodies.

Once a famous and talented Baul singer, Vaishnav lost his wife early and raised three sons single-handedly. Now in his sixties, his sons have deserted him as he fights a solitary battle with Alzheimer's disease, slowly forgetting his music and becoming a recluse. What happens when his youngest son coincidentally ends up getting married to Sharadiya, an old student of Vaishnav's who loved him like her own father? Can she get him the respect and recognitions society and his own sons have denied him?

Join anchor Paroma as she travels around the state to discover beautiful and inspiring stories of women. Celebrating womanhood, Paroma, engages women from all walks of life in interesting conversations and fun games, and even honours them with surprise gifts. This is one show you can't miss.

Laxmi hails from a small village in Gujarat. Trapped in a forced marriage with Shodhan, who is a city boy, Laxmi struggles to cope up with her new life. As she tries to get accustomed to this change, there is an undercurrent of a love triangle that will soon complicate her married life.

This hugely popular cookery show allows viewers to feast on the yummiest dishes, but with a twist. Celebrities or volunteers come on the show as guests and whip up healthier, tastier and cheaper versions of popular vegetarian dishes from across the world.

This social drama follows the story of a young and determined Suri. As per the norms of the village she belongs to, Suri is expected to do the household chores, and is held back from being what she wants to be. But the young rebel refuses to abide by this gender bias and pushes the boundaries to the best of her abilities. Whether it is playing the games only boys are allowed to play, or claiming her right to education, the power-packed Suri is here to change the way things are done.

Set against the backdrop of a village, Savaaj is the love story of Ashoka, the successor to the village head and Toral, a free-spirited village girl. While the two are madly in love with each other, society pressures and orthodox traditions are holding them back. Will Ashoka and Toral's love finally triumph? Or will another love story be buried under archaic customs?

This is a family drama that focuses on the life of the forever helpful and humble Kumkum Gadhvi, who is a devotee of Mata Ji, and is believed to have spiritual healing powers. But destiny plays a cruel game when Kumkum is forced to marry Jai Ghordhandas who has been suffering from Bipolar Syndrome and hence, is extremely temperamental and unpredictable. How does Kumkum make peace with her fate and will her faith heal her husband?

'Flavours Of Gujarat' is a unique cookery show that showcases a variety of simple, yet scrumptious delicacies. Anchor Dipali Gadhavi travels all across Gujarat and meets up with different local culinary geniuses, who put together dishes that are sure to get your taste buds tingling.

Gopal dies in an accident but refuses to stay in heaven. When Lord Krishna reasons with him about his death being his Karma, Gopal challenges the Lord to descend down on Earth and try living as a honest common man. What follows is a dramatic and hilarious account of the challenges Lord Krishna faces as he lives on earth as Gopal - a common man, without any divine powers.

Shattering the stereotypes of the typical Saas-Bahu sagas, here's 'Preet Piyu Aane Pannaben', a fresh take on the jaded relationship between a mother-in-law and her daughter-in-law. What happens when a daughter-in-law of a family becomes more important than her husband? And how do the dynamics change for the other relatives in the household?

This sitcom revolves around rivalries between two neighboring families, the Jobanputras and the Shastris. Led by two young ladies, the rivalry rises to a whole new level when the families are united through a marriage. The rivals now become relatives; Nanand and Bhabhi to be precise, and all hell breaks loose.

In 1760 Saasumaa, the bitter-sweet relationship between a mother-in-law and daughter-in-law creates a laugh-riot. While the daughter-in-law is the boss at the police station, the tables turn at home where Saasumaa has the last word.

Food Thi Gujarati showcases the quest for good food in both the usual as well as unusual places across Gujarat. It gives the viewers a taste at the historic importance, flavour and the best recipes offered by varied hotels and restaurants.

Tulsi is the daughter of Raghavbapa, who is a folk singer and poojari. Tulsi is an adult but because of an accident in her childhood, her brain has not developed with age. Raghavbapa and his friend, Digvijay, had fixed their children Tulsi and Abhijit's marriage when they were just born. But after Tulsi's accident, Raghav suffers from guilt and doesn't want Tulsi to go in front of Digvijay. But as luck would have it, Raghav comes face-to-face with Digvijay. But to his surprise, even after meeting Tulsi, Digvijay is ready to get her married to Abhijit. Will Abhijit accept Tulsi? Keep watching Shukra Mangal.

Chhuta Chheda features real-life stories about couples and many conflicts that come in the way of their relationships. The complications surrounding divorces are analysed and the show works towards a final resolution.

This show explores untold stories about famous temples as well as other little known religious places in Gujarat, shedding light on their historical and mythological significance. From showcasing aartis to highlighting other belief-driven practices, the show bridges the gap between the past and present.
Folklore artists narrate stories and legends through musical performances. Excerpts from ancient mythology also finds it's place among other anecdotes.

Season 1 of Chhutta Chheda touched hearts with its stories of painful divorces. The hit show now returns with a second season that's full of hope and second chances. This time around it is all about helping couples rebuild the broken bonds and rekindle the chemistry that once got them together. Can these estranged lovers actually overcome their differences?

Join Mahek on her journey of self-discovery as she asks the most pertinent questions about women's freedom in a marriage. Can freedom and marriage go hand-in-hand? Or will Mahek play the second fiddle to her husband's ambition all her life?

A sure-shot hot favourite of every film buff, Colors Cinema gives you a closer look at everything related to the Gujarati film industry. From interviews to reviews, from celebrity chats to movie set visits, we've got it all!

The Gujarati Iconic Film Awards, otherwise called GIFA, is a mega celebration of talent and passion, packed with stellar performances and much-deserved awards. So whether or not you're a lover of Gujarati cinema, this is one award night you do not want to miss!

The GUJMA Culture Fest 2017 celebrates amazing talent and ambition across various fields like cinema, TV, sports, business, music, literature, etc. A star-studded event inaugurated by the Chief Minister of Gujarat, this was one fabulous evening loaded with glitz, glam and glory.

Tamil heartthrob and unarguably the most eligible bachelor, Arya, is looking for his perfect match. Sixteen girls vie for Arya's affection as he spends quality time to choose THE ONE. In an 8-week-long show, Arya will look for emotional and intellectual compatibility and by the end of it, he may just find his life partner!

Rahul and Radha seem to have it all - a happy marriage, a decent job and a beautiful house! But what happens when Radha's pregnancy?announcement makes Rahul realise that he's been living the life he's supposed to and not necessarily the one he wants to? Can a partner hit pause on a seemingly perfect life and revaluate his choices? And what about Radha? Is she just a collateral damage to?his early mid life crisis? Watch our newest Voot Original, Time Out.
Oru Kadhai Paadatuma, Sir? That's what 40 directors and composers are asking! Spread across 40 days, watch these maestros narrate musical stories of love, life and lots more! Catch it now on Voot.

At an age where parents are the strongest pillars of support for a child, a young Vandhaal Sridevi faces humiliation at the hands of her own family. Her only confidant? Her grandmother who still believes that one-day Sridevi will get the love she deserves. Will that day ever come? Will Sridevi overcome the challenges of her life and win her family over? Find out only on Voot.

When a young village girl decides to carry her father's lineage in Tamil martial art form, Silambam, she's met with society's rigid opinions and orthodox thinking. But she's not the one to give up easily. With a bamboo stick in one hand, watch Velunachi strike hard against all social prejudices to make her father proud in this inspirational drama.

With a background of honour-killing, single mother Mageshwari trains her 11-year-old daughter to become an IPS officer. While Mageshwari struggles to live through the bloodied past, can her daughter fight all odds to become a successful IPS officer? Watch this inspiring tale of a mother's resolve, Sivagami, streaming now on Voot.

Podhum Ponnu dreams of becoming a big celebrity in Kollywood. The only hitch? She has to deal with her complexes. Can Podhum Ponnu break the stereotype against skin color? Will she be able to fight her inferiority complex? Can she remove the social stigma against body shaming? Find out in this uplifting drama of Perazhagi.

After a bone chilling first season, the legacy of Naagini continues with Shivanya's daughter, Shivani. While Shivanya tries hard to keep her daughter away from her real identity, it will not be long before destiny catches up with Shivani. In a strange twist of fate, Shivani falls in love with Rocky, who is the adopted son of Shivanya's arch nemesis Yamuna. The evil icchadhari naagini Shreya also returns as Ruchika. Can Shivani come into her own as an icchadhari naagini and protect the Naagmani? Or will the evil forces win this time?

Naagini (Tamil), the saga of love and revenge, has had the audience hooked since its launch. The series revolves around the life of an icchadhari naagin, Shivanya, who will go to any extent to avenge the death of her parents. In a bid to get closer to the murderers, Shivanya marries Karthik, who falls hopelessly in love with her. The sometimes warm, sometimes vicious, Naagin is now torn between her thirst for revenge and her growing attraction towards Karthik.

Do not underestimate the power of kids! Colors Super Kids present child prodigies who with their incredible talent will blow your mind away. From exceling in singing to dancing to athletics to even solving complex mathematical equations, there's nothing these little powerhouses cannot do! Join in the fun right here.

If there is one goddess in our mythology who is feared and revered at the same time, it is Kali. She is the ultimate destroyer. She destroys limitations so that we can create. She destroys the negative, so the positive can lead to a new beginning. Watch the magic and enigma that makes Kali, the mother of all goddesses.

series_name: Colors Tamil Ithu Namma Ooru Coloru 2018
decsription: The biggest event of the year is finally here! Watch the grand launch of Colors Tamil – Ithu Namma Ooru Coloru, the Colors of our Land. With an array of inspirational shows like Velunatchi, Sivagami and Perazhagi, the channel promises to keep you hooked on. What’s more? Superstar Arya is looking for his bride in our new show Enga Veetu Mapillai! So join us on this new journey.

For every Bahu in an Indian household the most important thing is to impress her Saas! But what happens when your mother-in-law turns into a monster-in-law? All hell breaks loose! Watch the saas-bahu saga unfold.

What happens when a Brahmin boy falls in love with a Kayasth girl? Set against the backdrop of casteism, Nee Thanae En Pon Vasantham is the story where two lovers decide to fight against the archaic system for the sake of their love! But can their love triumph over the deeply-rooted class and caste system?

Depicting the life of Lord Krishna, from the birth of the 'Makhan Chor' to him becoming the Prince of Mathura and Dwarka, this mythological drama also focusses the deep friendship Krishna shared with Sudama and his divine bond with Radha.

Farmers' suicide and the social consequences of this tragedy are closely inter-woven. In this show, the protagonist is one such victim who, when exploited by the rich, has to sacrifice her choices for the sake of her family.
Uyire Unakkaaha is a story about Rishi and Anu who fall deeply in love through a twist of fate and the vagaries of destiny. But life has something all together different planned out for the two.

Bharani, the son of a millionaire, is in mourning over the death of his first wife. Ragini, a middle class girl is disturbed by nightmares of snakes, while her parents desperately seek a cure. Soon, she sees Bharani in her dream and seeks to be his wife. Will she gain acceptance in Bharani's family? Moreover, what will transpire when her own husband morphs into a snake?
Chakravarthy Ashokar Samrat a historical drama series based on the life of the Indian Emperor of the Maurya Dynasty, Ashoka. It showcases the power struggles of this era.

Vaanavil portrays how a family's prejudice and pursuit for perfection alters the fate of its kin. Deprived of an education, companions and toys, Soumya struggles with the indifference her father and grandmother show towards her. Her only solace? Her mother's unwavering affection. Meanwhile, her younger sister Surabhi gets everything she wants, except for what she yearns for - her mother's love. What makes these parents discriminate between their own daughters? Watch the mystery unfold.

The stories of Vikram Vethal hold a special place in all our hearts and here's where you can relive the magic of those thrilling stories. Bringing to life the unique relationship between the King and his famous ghost companion, this show will take you right back to the good old days of childhood.

Based on real life crimes, Chakra Vyugam showcases instances of hair-raising criminal activity that have taken place across the country. Bringing to light the monstrous actions of criminals, the show compels its audience to raise a voice against miscreants and fight for what is right.
The show portrays the transition of Vinayak to Ganesha. It focuses more on the mother-son relationship between Ganesha and Parvati.

The super hit show focuses on Parvati, an orphaned village girl whose life changes completely when she meets Major Rudra Pratap. What follows is an unexpected and sensual love story, as they battle against the patriarchal rules of the Thakurs and escape from outlaws.

The series revolves around the lives of Zain and Aaliya, two lovers whose families are sworn enemies. What happens when the past of your family members haunts your future with your loved one? Can real love triumph over family rivalry?

Veera Hanuman gives you a glimpse into the life of Lord Hanuman, the deity who represents physical strength and devotion. From Hanuman's birth to meeting Ram for the first time and later serving him, this show traces all aspects of the life of Sankat Mochan.

Bengaluru Ganesha Utsava, one of the biggest events in Bangalore is celebrating the glory of Lord Ganesha along with the rise of Yash, the superstar. The festival is upbeat with performances from the leading stars of Film and Television Industry, including the songs by none other than Yash himself.

If you're a fan of Padmashri K S Chitra's songs, Yugala Geethe 2017 is the perfect musical extravaganza for you. Watch the 'Nightingale of South India' as she teams up with Rajesh Krishnan to bring to life her unforgettable hits.

Every story needs a storyteller, and every storyteller needs a stage! Make way for India's first collaborative filmmaking platform - Fameistan, where young filmmakers can make their dreams into a reality. Fameistan is not only a platform for budding artists to showcase their talent but also a golden opportunity to learn from the best filmmakers in the country.
Get ready for a musical night as the National Award winning singer and music director Shankar Mahadevan, is here to entertain the audience with his most popular Kannada hit songs.

E Samaya Rajamaya, held at the 55th Bengaluru Ganesha Utsava, is a grand musical concert dedicated to Dr Rajkumar. Singers from various walks of life are singing popular chartbusters filmed on the star. Watch this musical extravaganza only on Voot.

Celebrating Karnataka's rich musical and cultural heritage, Dasavani 2017 brings together talented singers and musicians to give a tribute to the saint poet Sangeetha Pitamaha Purandara Dasa. Melodious renditions, amazing performances and an epic celebration, makes Dasavani 2017 an affair to remember.

Shindeshahi Bana is a musical extravaganza to celebrate the music heritage of this celebrated family that has five generations representing many different forms of Marathi songs and music. Watch the mega event on Voot as various artists perform popular songs from the Shinde Gharana.

If you love Indie music, the MTV Indies Playlist is exactly what you've been looking for! We now have all those amazing songs, all those awesome artists, right here under one never-ending playlist. So just hit play and let the music work its magic.
Don't miss this grand musical extravaganza of fusion performances by Siddharth Suresh, Sankirthana Karnam, Saudamini Khare and Sushmitha Somashekar. Watch now on Voot.
When Masaba Gupta ticks, others talk. Catch Masaba in action as she shares what made her tick while reimaging time. #TickTalk
Biggest Marathi stars, amazing dance performances and stunning gigs, there's no better way to bring in the New Year! Get ready to be a part of the hottest New Year bash with Jallosh 2018.
Padmaavat is a story of honour, valour and obsession. Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh and Shahid Kapoor are coming to a screen near you on the 25th of January, 2018. Catch all the action on Voot.

The Ahmedabad Food Fest 2017 is a 3-day food extravaganza with more than 80 food stalls displaying an array of scrumptious Gujarati dishes! What's more? Star chef Ranveer Brar is doling out some amazing recipes which you don't want to miss! So, tune in now.
TOTAL HI-PERF Motorcycle Engine Oil presents #RideforLegends - a challenge taken up by 4 moto-vloggers who are out on the road to discover the legends of the society.

Catch the biggest stars from the Gujarati industry come together to honour talent and celebrate cinema in a glamorous night at GIFA 2017. Don't miss the scintillating performances by Arvind Vegda, Vivek Thakkar, Bhavya Gandhi, Shraddha Dangar, Deeksha Joshi and many more. And what's more, hosts Yatin Parmar and Wyoma Nandi make sure to make this an unforgettable night!

Love music? Think jazz is the ultimate expression of the musician's soul? Well, it's time to get transported to the wonderous world of jazz greats like Louis Armstrong, Miles Davis and Ela Fitzgerald! With a mix local and international jazz maestros hitting the right notes, Jus Jazz 2018 is a magical journey you just can't miss.
